body: * Fixes an issue when installs `xcbeautify` using Mint (#3). Thanks @yonaskolb!
title: Mint üå±

body:
* Improves performance significantly. Thanks @brennantaylor!

This is the last version that supports macOS 10.14.3 and below.

- Reduces binary size.
- This version requires macOS Mojave 10.14.4 or above.

## Changes

* Support building with Swift 4 (#10) @thii
* Fix bottling error on macOS High Sierra.

## Changes
- Remove backslashes before whitespaces in script build phases (#12) @guillaumealgis

## Changes
- Display a banner and warning or error in the quiet mode (#15) @greensky01
- Support filtering out ouput that aren't warnings and errors (#14) @thii
* Fixes crash when parsing `compileStoryboard` line

* Fixes crash when parsing `PBXCp` commands (#1). Thanks @vborodav!
* Improves format of other `AnalyzeShallow` and `ProcessPCH`.
- Fixed ProcessPCH++ not parsed and incorrect captured content for processPchCommand (#32) @greensky01
- Added support for parsing warnings and errors from Bazel build output (#35) @thii
- Added `--quieter` option to suppress warnings (#37) @jakub-gonet

## Changes

* Parallel & Concurrent Destination Testing (#16) @chriszielinski

## Changes
- Fixed parsing of Xcode 11.1 and above's outputs (#24) @thii
- Fixed log parsing for certain outputs for SwiftPM CLI on Linux (#21) @cyberbeni
- Bumped Swift tools version to 5.0 (#21) @cyberbeni

## Changes
- Fixed shell command matcher hiding UI test failures (#26) @cobbal
- Fixed Xcode 11.3 output (#28) @greensky01
* Failing tests are no longer being masked by the "--quiet" flag. (#29) @cobbal
* Added support for undefined symbol location warnings (#31) @kingslay

- Added support for the `NO_COLOR` environment variable (#50) @pieterclaerhout
- Added resolve graph parsing and display (#47) @yageek
- Added flag to disable colored output (#46) @yageek
- Migrated to Swift argument parser (#43) @Cyberbeni

The prebuilt binary is now a universal binary.
Release binaries for all platforms.
- Added `--is-ci` option to output test result under `--quiet` or `--quieter` flag (#39) @kinwahlai

## What's Changed
* Fixes Restarting Tests validation by @omarzl in https://github.com/thii/xcbeautify/pull/63

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/thii/xcbeautify/compare/0.10.1...0.10.2

## What's Changed
* Add initial support for JUnit report generation by @acecilia in https://github.com/thii/xcbeautify/pull/64

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/thii/xcbeautify/compare/0.10.2...0.11.0

## What's Changed
* Fix summary with multiple test plans and skipped tests by @joshdholtz in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/65
* Speedup Xcbeautify by applying frequency-based pattern matching. by @PaulTaykalo in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/67

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/compare/0.11.0...0.12.0

## What's Changed

* Update `JunitReporter` to parse parallel tests by @welshm in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/84
* Speedup regex by reducing backtracking by @MontakOleg in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/86

## New Contributors

- Added support for a GitHub Actions renderer to surface errors through GitHub's UI [#107](https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/107) by [@cpisciotta](https://github.com/cpisciotta)
- Updated `ArgumentParser` to 1.2.2 [#132](https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/132)
- Added support for `CompileSwift` and `SwiftCompile` outputs [#128](https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/128) by [@cpisciotta](https://github.com/cpisciotta).
- Added support for passing absolute paths via the `--report-path` flag [#129](https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/129) by [@cpisciotta](https://github.com/cpisciotta).

- Fixed handling -q for certain scenarios involving test cases (#139) by @grigorye
- Convert xcbeautify from Target to Executable Target (#140) by @cpisciotta 
- Revert "Refactor Pattern to Support SPM Compilation" (#141) by @cpisciotta
- **Breaking** Removed support for CocoaPods [#135](https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/135) by [@pepicrft](https://github.com/pepicrft)

## What's Changed
* CodeSign line format by @pyrtsa in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/169

* Update swift-actions/setup-swift digest to f51889e by @renovate in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/151

* Update dependency apple/swift-argument-parser to from: "1.3.0" by @renovate in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/167
* Move OutputType Definitions by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/176
* Update Package.resolved by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/180
* Update Makefile by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/181
* Simplify Inner Parser Method by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/177


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/compare/1.1.1...1.2.0

## What's Changed
* Create New Output Issue Template by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/184
* Delete InnerParser Type by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/183
* Add failable init to CaptureGroup by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/178
* Add SwiftFormat by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/pull/216


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/compare/1.2.0...1.3.0

## What's Changed

**xcbeautify has a new home! üè†** Make sure to update your xcbeautify URLs to the new one.

###  Examples - Changes Required

```diff
- https://github.com/tuist/xcbeautify/
+ https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/
```

```diff
- git@github.com:tuist/xcbeautify.git
+ git@github.com:cpisciotta/xcbeautify.git
```

This release contains housekeeping changes only and does not impact source code.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/compare/1.3.0...1.3.1

## What's Changed
* Refactor Formatting Methods Requiring Raw Input by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/233


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/compare/1.3.1...1.4.0

## What's Changed
* Introduce ParsingTests by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/235
* Delete OutputType+CustomStringConvertible by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/239
* Enable Dependabot by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/240
* Treat Warnings as Errors by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/241
* Drop Bazel Support by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/182
* Delete Unnecessary Homebrew Formula by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/245
* Clean Up Release Workflow by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/246
* Bump Minimum Swift Version to 5.9 by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/218
* Bump codecov/codecov-action from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/247
* Use Package Access Modifier by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/249
* Introduce XCBeautifier by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/250


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/compare/1.4.0...2.0.0-beta.1
title: 2.0.0 (Beta 1)

body:
## What's Changed

Drastically improve xcbeautify's performance (time and memory). Testing with a large xcodebuild log, this change dropped xcbeautify's execution time by ~90% and memory footprint by ~99%.

- Reduce unnecessary type instantiations, namely NSRegularExpression.
- Skip parsing empty lines.
- Introduce time-tracking logic and large xcodebuild log test to (1) find and fix the existing issue and (2) prevent future performance regressions.

See testing results [here](https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/253).


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/compare/1.4.0...1.5.0

## What's Changed

- More speed improvements (see [here](https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/254#issue-2153104667))!
- Add SwiftCompile Support by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/254

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/compare/1.5.0...1.6.0

## What's Changed
* Add SwiftCompile Support by @cpisciotta in https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/pull/254


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cpisciotta/xcbeautify/compare/2.0.0-beta.2...2.0.0-beta.3
title: 2.0.0 (Beta 3)
